Package itec3030.assignments.a2

Class OldTempSensorAdapter

java.lang.Object
itec3030.assignments.a2.OldTempSensorAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
itec3030.smarthome.standards.Controllable, itec3030.smarthome.standards.NumericMeasurementInstrument, itec3030.smarthome.standards.SmartThing, itec3030.smarthome.standards.TemperatureSensor
public class OldTempSensorAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements itec3030.smarthome.standards.TemperatureSensor
OldTempSensorAdapter adapts the OldTempSensor to make it satisfy with SSDCS
